title: How to invest in buy-to-let: where your £15,000 will earn the highest returns
text:
Do you want to invest in buy-to-let – but don't know how? In this four-part series, we find out where and how to invest in property in the UK with different budgets, from £15,000 to £100,000, and take a look at how far your money can take you.

Investing in buy-to-let property has become a very different ballgame in the last five years, thanks to the government's crackdown on landlords and the sluggish market.

According to Nationwide’s index, UK price growth in the last year was just 0.2 per cent. Owners can no longer expect to buy a property, sit on it, and automatically turn a profit; it's all about yields. The value of an investment now is “in rents, not house price growth,” says Richard...
description: Do you want to invest in buy-to-let – but don't know how?
